scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev" --names "backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "blue,green"
scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.typecheck: cd backend && npm run typecheck && cd ../frontend && npm run typecheck
scripts.clean: cd backend && rm -rf dist node_modules && cd ../frontend && rm -rf dist node_modules
